document_data.name: Ash tree
document_data.mainbody: '''Ash''' was a type of tree found in [[Faerun]].
document_data.Varieties:
* '''Black ash''' grew in the [[Trollbark Forest]].
* '''Water ash''' grew in the [[Vast Swamp]] of [[Cormyr]].
* '''White ash''' grew in the [[midwood]] part of the forest of [[Cormanthor]].<ref>
document_data.Heraldry: A tiny brilliant white star balanced on an open lush green ash leaf was an old symbol of the goddess [[Mielikki]].<ref>
